title: Conroe North/ Montgomery New Fitness Center Resort Style Pool
posting_body: ['For leasing information call or text', 'show contact info', 'today!!!', 'Ask for ID# 4384A', "Located in Conroe, Texas, we provide residents with the comforts of today's lifestyle while preserving the unique feel of the past.", 'Luxurious crown molding, nine foot ceilings, and arched entryways greet you as you enter our 1, 2, or 3 bedroom apartment homes.', ' You will enjoy our resort-style pool with amazing palm trees and gazebo, our state-of-the-art fitness center, game room with billiards, and club room with kitchen for our residents.', 'We are conveniently located near downtown Conroe, with shopping, dining, and entertainment within walking distance.', 'Lake Conroe is within ten minutes and we have easy access to Interstate 45.', ' We are the proud recipient of the SatisFacts Customer Service Award for the third year in a row.', 'Valet Trash Removal Services', 'Garages', 'Electronic on-line payments', 'Easy Access to Hwy 45', 'Packages accepted for our residents', '24-Hour Onsite Maintenance for on-line workorders', 'Business Center with conference table', 'Carports', 'Club room with kitchen and large screen TV', 'Complimentary coffee / tea / hot cocoa bar', 'Complimentary DVD Library', 'Courtesy Officer/Patrol', 'Detached Garages & Storage Units', 'Game room with Billiards and Darts', 'Gas & Charcoal Grills', 'Gated community with controlled access', 'Internet/Cable discounts', 'Monthly Resident Events', 'Outdoor Gazebo', 'Outdoor kitchen with gas grills', 'Pet Friendly', 'Pet Park', 'Recycling', 'Resort-style Swimming Pool', 'State-of-the-art fitness center', 'Unparalleled Customer Service', 'Wi-Fi in clubhouse and pool', 'Minutes from Candy Cane Park']
